document_data.caption: ''An [[dwarven]] [[bard]] mocking patrons of a tavern with his insufferable songs.''
document_data.name: Vicious Mockery
document_data.mainbody: '''''Vicious mockery''''' was a [[cantrip]] used by [[bard]]s to hurl insults at a creature.
document_data.Effects: A bard used this spell to hurl enchantment-powered insults at a target creature. The creature had to be within {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}} of the bard. For the spell to be effective, the creature had to be able to hear the bard, but did not need to speak the same language. As a result of this spell, the target creature suffered minor psychic damage.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]: an eye of a [[newt]], which had to be [[petrified]].
